properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QNA WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT QNA_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,QNA_TITLE ,USER_ID ,Q.CREATE_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) JOIN QNA_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
